scripts.compile: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:css-min
scripts.compile:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/style.scss css/style.css
scripts.compile:css-min: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/style.scss css/style.min.css
